outputs.output_descr: Project approved by Multilateral Fund for the Implementation of the Montreal Protocol to assist Belize in the terminal phaseout of ozone depleted substances. Project to be executed using National Execution modality with the Department of Environment acting as executing agency.

project_descr:
TERMINAL PHASEOUT MANAGEMENT PLAN (TPMP)
FOR THE PHASE OUT OF ODS IN THE
REFRIGERATION AND
AIR-CONDITIONING SECTOR
